channel.title: CVE Feed for INEA -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for INEA -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-35762|2024-08-02T16:30:44.630Z -- inea -- me%20rtu
item.description: Versions of INEA ME RTU firmware 3.36b and prior are vulnerable to operating system (OS) command injection, which could allow remote code execution.

item.title: CVE-2023-29155|2024-08-02T14:00:15.822Z -- inea -- me%20rtu
item.description: Versions of INEA ME RTU firmware 3.36b and prior do not require authentication to the "root" account on the host system of the device. This could allow an attacker to obtain admin-level access to the host system.

item.title: CVE-2023-2131|2024-08-02T06:12:20.498Z -- inea -- me%20rtu
item.description: Versions of INEA ME RTU firmware prior to 3.36 are vulnerable to OS command injection, which could allow an attacker to remotely execute arbitrary code.
